subject: add more items to the menu
preview: Hi Rosanna, Confirming we have added the Spaghetti Amatriciana.

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosanna, 

Confirming we have added the Spaghetti Amatriciana.

Hi Heath,
Can you please add to the take away menu also

Spaghetti Amatriciana
Served with guanciale shallots, Napoletana Sauce and chilli $43


Kind Regards

Rosanna


Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano
123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au <mailto:info@machiavelli.com.au>
www.machiavelli.com.au <http://www.machiavelli.com.au/>
Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.
Closed Sundays and public holidays.

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>>
Sent: Friday, 6 August 2021 8:13 PM
To: Machiavelli <info@machiavelli.com.au <mailto:info@machiavelli.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Take away order - jessicamrizk@outlook.com <mailto:jessicamrizk@outlook.com>

Hi Rosanna,

We have updated so that the customer receives a confirmation as well.

Regarding the wine list, there as many items, it would not be a good idea to have them all coded on the page like that. Could we perhaps attach the PDF and give them a free text field to type in which wine they would like? Or maybe have a check box that says ‘I would like to order wine’ so that when you call for payment info you know to ask them?
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>
<https://wpperk.com/>


On 6 Aug 2021, at 8:04 pm, Machiavelli <info@machiavelli.com.au <mailto:info@machiavelli.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Heath,
Sorry I am giving you a things a little a time, I have just found out that we are allowed to sell alcohol until the lockdown is on. I have attached our wine list can we add this as an option please

Kind Regards

Rosanna

Subject: Re: Take away order - jessicamrizk@outlook.com <mailto:jessicamrizk@outlook.com>

Hi Rosanna,

We have made some changes, let’s see how they go now? IF they still land in your junk mail, please select them and mark them as not junk. This can help also.

Also did you get my video about adding my email address to your Stripe account so that I can hook it up to the website?

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>
